sentences.en: APRO STONE MERCANTILE retailer of high grade onyx ash urn.
sentences.cn: 安富玉石骨灰盅直销中心,专营高质骨灰盅及殡仪用品零售.

sentences.en: Bailida company is a chain store retailer of popular - priced fashion apparel.
sentences.cn: 百利达公司是一家经营平价时尚服饰的连锁零售企业.

sentences.en: Can the packaging help you sell the retailer too?
sentences.cn: 包装本身能不能帮助你成功向零售商销售?

sentences.en: Furniture and carpet retailers are among those reporting the sharpest annual decline in sales.
sentences.cn: 家具和地毯零售商们是在那些报告最大年销售下滑的商家之中。

sentences.en: Improve the partner relationship between suppliers and the retailer.
sentences.cn: 改善与供应商的夥伴关系.

sentences.en: In this model, the retailer uses continuous review QS inventory policy.
sentences.cn: 该模型采用连续检查的QS库存策略.

sentences.en: It is extremely rare for a retailer to reduce their range.
sentences.cn: 零售商减少销售范围是及其少见的事.

sentences.en: It made it almost impossible for the smaller retailer to compete against the multiples.
sentences.cn: 这使得小零售商几乎不可能跟连锁店竞争。

sentences.en: It was the second most - visited online retailer in December, after eBay.
sentences.cn: 它还是12月份访问人数最多的在线经销商.

sentences.en: Take the goods back to your retailer who will refund you the purchase price.
sentences.cn: 把商品退还给你的零售商，他们会按原价退款的。

sentences.en: That retailer specializes in components for the telecommunications field.
sentences.cn: 那家零售商专门经营电信领域的零件.

sentences.en: The retailer has assembled a team in Shanghai to examine the question.
sentences.cn: 这家零售商在上海组建了一支团队研究这个问题.

sentences.en: The retailer has to absorb the cost of wastage.
sentences.cn: 零售商须承受耗损的费用.

sentences.en: The retailer introduced all sorts of recorders to a keen enquiring consumer.
sentences.cn: 零售商向那位热切咨询的消费者介绍了所有的录音机.

sentences.en: Then you'll be able to keep up with retailer's demand.
sentences.cn: 这样你们就能跟上零售商的需求.

sentences.en: Top retailer Marks & Spencer has romped in with another set of sparkling results.
sentences.cn: 零售巨头玛莎百货再次凭借一系列耀眼的成绩轻松胜出。

trans.tran_en: a person or business that sells goods to customers in a shop
